FUDPUCKER’S CONTACT INFORMATION
WE WOULD LOVE TO HEAR FROM YOU!
Unlike many businesses we really like to hear from our customers. Whooooaaaah! We want to ensure you have a great time when dining with us and enjoying the many FUN things to do at Fudpuckers.
If you have a question for us or would like to learn more about Fudpucker’s please email us at  fudpucker@fudpucker.com  or call the restaurant at 850-654-4200.  One of our incredibly knowledgeable staff members will do everything they can to assist you.  If they can’t, they will direct you to a manager or someone who can.
You may also contact us by snail mail at the following address:
Fudpucker’s Beachside Bar & Grill
20001 Emerald Coast Pkwy
Destin, FL 32541
850-654-4200
Should you have a question for the main office please feel free to give us a call at
(850) 654-1544.

Gator Beach Tours
Friday August 29th
Looking to create unforgettable family memories in Destin? The
Gator Tours at Gator Beach
offer the perfect mix of excitement, education, and hands-on fun for all ages. Whether you choose the
Discovery Tour
’s guided exploration or the
VIP Experience
’s behind-the-scenes thrills, you’ll get up close with real alligators in a safe, interactive setting. It’s more than just a tour… it’s a chance to laugh, learn, and bond over a wild Florida adventure your family will talk about long after the vacation ends.
Book your Gator Tour
toda
y and make your beach trip truly legendary!
Visit
Gator Beach
for more information.
09:00 AM – 08:00 PM
Gator Beach Tours
Saturday August 30th
Runs until Saturday, January 24th, 2026

Burgers, Bourbon & Beer Festival
Saturday September 20th
Join us as we compete in the 5th Annual Burgers, Bourbon & Beer Festival returns to Destin, FL on Saturday, September 20, 2025! Get ready for an afternoon packed with gourmet burgers, local craft beers, and the finest bourbons—all in support of the Boys & Girls Clubs of the Emerald Coast. Every bite and sip helps build great futures for local youth!
Location: 210 Harbor Blvd, Destin, FL, United States, Florida
Tickets:  bit.ly/BBBFest2025
12:00 PM – 03:00 PM
Destin Seafood Festival
Saturday September 27th
Sundays, Fridays and Saturdays every week
Join us for the 47th Annual Destin Seafood Festival, spanning all along the Destin Harbor! Fudpucker’s will be competing in the VIP area and sponsoring the Kid’s Zone!
Schedule: September 26th | 4pm-10pm September 27th | 10am-10pm September 28th | 10am-6pm’
The main festival is FREE TO ATTEND! Visit over 75 vendor booths, 5 music stages, Kids Zone, tons of local seafood vendors and more. Seafood and more available for purchase up and down the Destin Harbor.
VIP Tickets will be required to enter our VIP area where attendees will sample a variety of food from local chefs. VIPs will also have access to private bathrooms, additional live music, private bar, and seating area.
VIP Tickets on sale now: https://www.eventliveus.com/…/vip-tickets-destin…
Visit www.destinseafoodfestival.com for more information!
10:00 AM – 10:00 PM
Pirate Brew Fest
Saturday November 1st
Pirate Brew Fest 2025  Ahoy, Mateys!  Set sail for Pirate Brew Fest at Fudpucker’s Beachside Bar & Grill on November 1, 2025, from 11 AM – 3 PM! This FREE event brings local breweries and distillers offering free samples and swag, plus axe throwing, pirate games, live island-rock tunes from Coconut Radio, and Fudpucker’s flame-grilled bites.   Browse handcrafted art, beer memorabilia, and soak up the salty, swashbuckling atmosphere.  Show off your pirate flair, our costume contest is looking for the fiercest buccaneers! Prizes await the best-dressed pirates!  Don your tricorns and eye patches; four hours of pirate fun await!
11:00 AM – 03:00 PM
